value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Brother... I...$k$p$WmMPID_ディアドラ,ch06_07_Diadora_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Princess Veronica, you look so pale.
Is everything all right?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|My brother is on a journey...$k$pHe told me he planned to search for a
cure for the both of us...$k$pI don't quite understand what he
means. Neither of us is sick...$k$p$WmMPID_ディアドラ,ch06_07_Diadora_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Oh, princess...$k$pYou're not unlike me, are you?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|In what way?$k$p$WmMPID_ディアドラ,ch06_07_Diadora_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Bound by the blood you were born
with... And deprived of your own
thoughts...$k$pYou cannot even be with the ones
you love. I understand this anguish...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|...$k$pMy brother told me to bring an end to
all this fighting... But I don't know how
to stop.$k$pBecause that voice keeps whispering
to me... "Kill Askr!"$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|$w0|A fine demonstration of strength. I
thank you for it, for now we are
freed...$k$p$WmMPID_ディアドラ,ch06_07_Diadora_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Oh, Lord Sigurd...$k$p$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Deirdre... Let's go home. Here and
now, I swear this to you: I will never
leave your side again.$k$p$WmMPID_ディアドラ,ch06_07_Diadora_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Thank you...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Did that do the trick?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキアンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Yes, thank you. I've had ample time to
prepare for the rite.$k$pThe rainbow bridge will become real...
Soon, our king and his forces will
invade.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Hah! Picture it. Isn't it grand?$k$p$Sbs150|
